All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Constants
    Constants.java - a Java interface designed for storing all constants in the applicaiton.
    ErrorMessage
    ErrorMessage.java - a Java ENUM designed for storing information about error messages.
    GenerateOPHelper
    GenerateOPHelper.java - a Java class designed for generating output on console.
    ICommonUtil
    ICommonUtil.java - a Java interface designed to contain all utility methods.
    ImportedSalesTax
    ImportedSalesTax.java - a Java class which implements ISalesTax interface for calculating tax.
    InvalidDataException  
    ISalesTax
    ISalesTax.java - a Java interface for calculating tax It can have multiple implementation classes, we are designed this interface as per Template Design Pattern.
    IValidatePredicate  
    NonTaxableProducts
    NonTaxableProducts.java - a Java ENUM designed for storing information about non-taxable products
    Product
    Product.java - a Java class acts as a Model or POJO for storing Product information like product name, quantity, base price of that product, tax applied on that product, total price after applying tax on that product, whether product is imported or not.
    Response  
    SalesTax
    SalesTax.java - a Java class which implements ISalesTax interface for calculating tax.
    SalesTaxHelper
    SalesTaxHelper.java - a Java helper class consists of methods like creating Response object for the generation of output, calculating total sales tax, calculating total bill
    SalesTaxMain
    SalesTaxMain.java - a Java class consists of main method, for running this application this class acts as bootstrap.
    SalesTaxTest
